###### **Overview**

Master of Professional Science is a hybrid Master’s degree accredited by the Malaysian Qualifications Agency, designed for candidates to expand scientific knowledge in STEM whilst acquiring business and management skills to build competitive edge, improve employment prospect and support professional development. Universiti Teknologi Malaysia is the first university in the nation to offer an innovative and multidisciplinary program that bridges science to business and management to groom future-ready graduates with 21st century skills. Candidates are required to take a business and management component and CHOOSE\* one (1) of the following specialized STEM areas:  
![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/fast-forward_4662135.png) Operations Research  
![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/fast-forward_4662135.png) Applied Chemistry  
![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/fast-forward_4662135.png) Applied Mathematics  
![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/fast-forward_4662135.png) Nanophysics

**Note** : Please contact Program Coordinator to enquire about availability of specialization areas that will be offered for prospective students before applying for the program

[MQA](https://www2.mqa.gov.my/mqr/english/epapariptaAA.cfm?IDAkrKP=16327)

###### **Programme Educational Objectives**

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Manage and develop a more competitive organization locally and globally using knowledge of science and management.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Lead and communicate with co-workers and workers from other organizations at various levels of the organization.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Carry out their work responsibly and with professional ethics showing concern for society and the environment with an appreciation of global perspectives.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Improve knowledge and develop skills through lifelong learning.

###### **Learning Outcomes**

Upon completion of the program requirements, the graduate will be able to:

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Integrate advanced knowledge in Science and Management.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Acquire new and transferable skills in conducting research.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Demonstrate critical thinking in identifying and solving problems.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Demonstrate accountability and responsibility for professional practice and society.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Communicate effectively to scientists, industry and society.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Adapt knowledge of science and management for effective lifelong learning.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Demonstrate Managerial and Entrepreneurial Skills.

The normal requirement for admission to the programme is a four-year bachelor degree recognized by the university in either engineering or sciences.
